name: A long-hidden gem of Vietnam !
description: When it comes to beautiful beaches or islands in Vietnam, you might have in mind some familiar and famous names such as Nha Trang, Phu Quoc, Da Nang, Ha Long, and so on. Well yes, they are all great and I would recommend you to visit them all if possible. But here I would like to introduce to you a new name, which has no less, if not more, to offer : Co To Island.
